1. Raining Code color: Choose the color of characters of the raining code. 2. Raining code density: Number of columns of the raining code on the screen. the higher the number the more dense the raining code will appear. The default number is 25. 3. Raining code speed: This parameter defines the speed of characters in the column (how fast the raining code falls). Default value is 50. 4. Unlock "My Message" customization: This will allow you to define your own message. The words from your message will randomly appear in the raining code. You will have to complete a challenge to unlock this option. 5. My Message in the raining code: Here you can define your own message. The words from your message will randomly appear in the raining code. 6. Highlight my message: If enabled, the words from your message will be highlighted in the raining code with blue and purple colors. 7. Use custom background image: You can choose an image stored on your phone as a background for raining code. Default background is black. 8. Select background image: Click this preference to launch an image selection wizard. 9. Background transparency: This parameter defines how clearly the image you chose for the background will be visible. The higher the value of the transparency the more clearly the image will be visible.
